price: Nagsabi ito: “Panginoon ko, tunay na ako ay nangangamba na magpasinungaling sila sa akin.
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّيٓ أَخَافُ أَن يُكَذِّبُونِ

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi innī akhāfu an yukadhibūni
